info.name: Keep my Google Doodle: First Day of Fall 2015
info.description: Permanently replace the logo on Google homepage by the “First Day of Fall 2015 (Southern Hemisphere)” Google Doodle.
info.additionalInfo: UPDATES 2015/05/10 • Original release • Fixed sizing ratio (no more subtle vertical stretching) ADVICES This userstyle only apply on the regular desktop Google Search homepage, doesn't works with mobile version. Also doesn't replace the logo in the search results page header. CREDITS Google Doodle design & stop-motion animation by Kirsten Lepore: http://www.kirstenlepore.com/
